senselogic.sitevision.api.resource

Interface FontUtil


  • @Requireable(value="FontUtil")
public interface FontUtil
    Utility interface for Fonts.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getFontUtil(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node getFontByClassName(String aClassName)
      Gets the font with a given class name
      Node getFontByClassName(String aClassName, Node aDefaultValue)
      Gets the font with a given class name with a fallback value if no font matches
      Node getFontByName(String aFontName)
      Gets the font with a given font name
      Node getFontByName(String aFontName, Node aDefaultValue)

    • Method Detail

      • getFontByName

        Node getFontByName(String aFontName)
        Gets the font with a given font name
        Parameters:
        aFontName - the name of the font
        Returns:
        the first font with name aFontName, or null if no font matches

      • getFontByName

        Node getFontByName(String aFontName,
                   Node aDefaultValue)
        Gets the font with a given font name with a fallback value if no font matches
        Parameters:
        aFontName - the name of the font
        aDefaultValue - fallback value
        Returns:
        the first font with name aFontName, or aDefaultValue if no font matches

      • getFontByClassName

        Node getFontByClassName(String aClassName)
        Gets the font with a given class name
        Parameters:
        aClassName - the class name of the font
        Returns:
        the first font with class name aClassName, or null if no font matches

      • getFontByClassName

        Node getFontByClassName(String aClassName,
                        Node aDefaultValue)

        Parameters:
        aClassName - the class name of the font
        aDefaultValue - fallback value
        Returns:

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
